scripts.tauri:build: node scripts/update-app-name.cjs && tauri build && node scripts/restore-app-name.cjs
scripts.build:macos: NODE_ENV=production node scripts/update-app-name.cjs && tauri build --target aarch64-apple-darwin && tauri build --target x86_64-apple-darwin && node scripts/restore-app-name.cjs
scripts.build:windows: NODE_ENV=production node scripts/update-app-name.cjs && tauri build --target aarch64-pc-windows-msvc && tauri build --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc && node scripts/restore-app-name.cjs
scripts.build:windows-gnu: NODE_ENV=production node scripts/update-app-name.cjs && tauri build --target x86_64-pc-windows-gnu && node scripts/restore-app-name.cjs
scripts.build:linux: NODE_ENV=production node scripts/update-app-name.cjs && tauri build --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu && tauri build --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu && node scripts/restore-app-name.cjs
